data.Name: Su Theriault
data.staff_bio:
Su Theriault has been in the field of early education and care for thirty years.  She began  as a Head Start classroom aide and moved on to several other positions within the agency.  After several years as a private consultant and trainer, she spent several years with the Head Start Bureau’s National Training and Technical Assistance Network.

She currently holds the position of Mentor Coordinator with Boston Ready.  In this capacity she facilitates professional development experiences and online courses for Boston Ready participants and along with supporting the project’s Boston Public School literacy coaches.  Ms. Theriault is committed to ensuring that young children have access to high level and caring teachers along with rich curriculum experiences.
